definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: What is life like for a dubber in Beijing?
sentences.chinese: 北京的配音演員過着怎樣的生活？

sentences.english: Bernstein took voiceover classes at night and loved it.
sentences.chinese: 她晚上去聽配音課，對配音事業情有獨鍾。

sentences.english: Bernstein took voiceover classes at night and loved it.
sentences.chinese: 她晚上去聽配音課，對配音事業情有獨鍾。

sentences.english: He entered into the dubbing room.
is an agent in Los Angeles for a voice casting agency.
sentences.chinese: 她是洛杉磯一家配音公司的代理人。

sentences.english: GS: : Voice actors are often isolated away from the rest of the acting crew.
sentences.chinese: 通常來說，配音演員和其他表演團隊是分開的。

sentences.english: The soundtrack, however, was impossible to hear.
sentences.chinese: 然而卻很難聽到電影的配音。

sentences.english: In China dubbing is the standard method adopted in translating imported films.
sentences.chinese: 配音翻譯是中國目前引進的外片採用的主要翻譯形式。

sentences.english: Ross: Good. Maybe he can switch it back.
sentences.chinese: 好啊，也許這次它能把配音換回來。

sentences.english: Once it's green-lit, the deals to the actors are made.
sentences.chinese: 一旦綠光閃過，就可以聘請配音演員了。

sentences.english: And the voice of the film the other actors are also quite good, no clear winner.
sentences.chinese: 而且片中其他演員的配音也都相當出色，不分伯仲。

sentences.english: A. Bayona said that I was incredibly lucky to have worked on a Ghibli film.
sentences.chinese: 巴亞納就說我能夠爲吉卜力電影配音實在是太幸運了。

sentences.english: Add the finishing touches with a custom soundtrack, voiceovers and titles.
sentences.chinese: 添加一個自定義的配樂，配音和字幕的收尾工作。

sentences.english: Were you thinking about working in the field of voice acting from the start?
sentences.chinese: 從一開始，你就是想做配音工作嗎？

sentences.english: Enables an author to create pages with background sounds or soundtracks .
sentences.chinese: 定義使頁面能夠帶有背景聲音或配音。

sentences.english: He voices Soundwave & Devastator in Fallen.
sentences.chinese: 《變形金剛2》中聲波和大力神由他配音。

definition: voice actor (loanword from Japanese 声優 seiyū)
opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
sung performance/to sing for an audience
